body.p:
This file implements the single page app. The file serves the following functions:
Link to the app's CSS and JS files
Declare Angular bindings
This includes mapping the BODY tag to the 4D app, mapping a DIV to the app's main controller, mapping buttons to controller functions, and mapping DIV elements to various directive data models (topic, TOC, and search data).
Declare app configuration
The index file includes JS to declare config data such as:
The search data file to use for this publication
Paths to different directories this publication will use
Files this publication will use -- Root document (index.html), DITAMAP file (for the TOC), XSLT file to generate the TOC, XSLT file to generate topic content, and other files.
Lay out the 4D Pubs display
When you open the index.html file:

li.p: The app loads the Search data as a JSON object
The app loads the default topic and displays it
